title: ROGERTHAT777
author: ROGERTHAT777
content: If you have a video or step by step instruction on how to get some of the alt network coins, please let me know.  I have metamask apple iphone 11.  I have bought coins before but I  don't how to add these netowrks to the ones I already have, or if i buy FSN heico and polygon on pancakeswap and then send then to another blockchain custom added? thank you.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: If your question is about how to buy the 3 altcoins you mentioned, you will easily find exchanges or DEXs where the three altcoins are traded here: Fusion (FSN) | Huobi Token (HT) | Polygon (MATIC)Q: Can I buy $FSN, $HT and $MATIC tokens from DEX Pancakeswap and then migrate them to their native network?A: No, if you bought $FSN, $HT and $MATIC which are on BEP20 (BSC) network, you can't transfer them to their native network directly.Questions about how to setup the Fusion network, HECO network and also Polygon on Metamask, you can find them on the following links: Fusion Network | HECO Network | Polygon NetworkReferences:[1] https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/fusion/markets/[2] https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/huobi-token/markets/[3] https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/polygon/markets/[4] https://decentralizedcreator.com/add-fusion-network-fsn-to-metamask/[5] https://medium.com/heco-chain/how-to-set-up-matemask-for-heco-chian-53eda451424c[6] https://medium.com/stakingbits/setting-up-metamask-for-polygon-matic-network-838058f6d844

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Quote from: ROGERTHAT777 on December 03, 2022, 01:32:22 AMand then I can just send the HT coin to the HECO network and buy the heco coin wit the HT there right? I already added the networks thanks guysYour HT token was based on ethereum blockchain and it can't be send to the HECO network as it was a native blockchain owned by Huobi. You need to bridge it if you wanna try to send it to the HECO network. There are some solutions for that1. Use bridge to convert your HT (ethereum) to the heco chain2. You can create account on huobi and then depositing your HT token. You can withdraw your HT to the heco chain address directly from there.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: ROGERTHAT777 on December 03, 2022, 01:32:22 AMand then I can just send the HT coin to the HECO network and buy the heco coin wit the HT there right? I already added the networks thanks guysI think all the useful information that I have shared before can be put to good use for your knowledge, $HT that is on the Ethereum network cannot be transferred directly to the HECO network. I think the answer from @asriloni is enough to represent everyone's answers here. For the bridge itself, you can see the following tutorial provided by ChanSwap: https://docs.chainswap.com/user-guide-1/swap/eth-heco
